alert.note: Alert for Horry (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wilmington (Northeastern South Carolina and Southeastern North Carolina - Wilmington)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 03 at 3:13PM EDT until July 03 at 4:15PM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: The National Weather Service in Wilmington has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southwestern Brunswick County in southeastern North Carolina... South central Columbus County in southeastern North Carolina... Southeastern Horry County in northeastern South Carolina... * Until 415 PM EDT. * At 313 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Nixonville, or 8 miles west of North Myrtle Beach Airport, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor hail damage to vehicles is possible. Expect wind damage to trees and power lines. * Locations impacted include... Myrtle Beach, North Myrtle Beach, Shallotte, Sunset Beach, Holden Beach, Ocean Isle Beach, Little River, North Myrtle Beach Airport, Cherry Grove Inlet, Iredell, Carolina Shores, Calabash, Hickory Grove, Nakina, Bughill, Longwood, Seaside, Nixonville, Barefoot Landing Area Of North Myrtle Beach and Wampee. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Large hail and damaging winds and continuous cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Move indoors immediately. Lightning is one of nature`s leading killers. Remember, if you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning.
